text_logic_form: Line $AB$ is tangent to the circle $O$.
Line $CB$ is also tangent to the circle $O$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Line $AB$ is tangent to the circle $O$.
Line $CB$ is also tangent to the circle $O$.
diagram_logic_form: The measure of angle $ABC$ is $2x+1$ degrees.
The measure of angle $ABD$ is $3x-7$ degrees.
Point $C$ also lies on the circle $O$.
